topic.title: 개인 예산 관리하기
topic.description: 개인 예산 관리는 수입과 지출을 체계적으로 기록하고 계획하여 재정적 목표를 달성하는 방법입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: Bob, 요즘 돈 관리가 좀 어려워. 혹시 예산 관리하는 법 알아?
나도 처음엔 어려웠는데, 기본적인 것부터 시작했어.
가장 먼저 할 일은 한 달 수입과 지출을 모두 적는 거야.
응, 그러면 돈이 어디로 새는지 파악하는 데 도움이 돼.
아하, 그걸 알아야 불필요한 지출을 줄일 수 있겠구나.
맞아, 그리고 나서 고정 지출과 변동 지출을 구분해서 계획을 세우면 돼.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Bob, I'm having trouble managing my money lately. **Do you know how to budget**?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Bob, | I'm having trouble managing my money lately. | Do you know how to budget?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes! **It was hard for me at first too, but I started with the basics.**
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes! | It was hard for me at first too, | but I started with the basics.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, **then it helps to identify where your money is going.**
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I don't know how to start.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Right, **and then you can plan by separating fixed and variable expenses.**
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: The first thing to do is | to write down all your monthly income and expenses.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: Bob, I'm having trouble managing my money lately. Do you know how to budget?
It was hard for me at first too, but I started with the basics.
I don't know how to start.
The first thing to do is to write down all your monthly income and expenses.
Write down all income and expenses?

keywords: Helps identify where money is going
keyword_speeches.target_sentence: Yes, then it helps to identify where your money is going.
Ah, I see, knowing that helps reduce unnecessary spending.
Right, and then you can plan by separating fixed and variable expenses.
Bob, I'm having trouble managing my money lately. Do you know how to budget?
It was hard for me at first too, but I started with the basics.
I don't know how to start.
The first thing to do is to write down all your monthly income and expenses.
Write down all income and expenses?
Yes, then it helps to identify where your money is going.
Ah, I see, knowing that helps reduce unnecessary spending.
Right, and then you can plan by separating fixed and variable expenses.

It was hard for me at first too, but I started with the basics.

highlight_sentences.korean_text: 그러면 돈이 어디로 새는지 파악하는 데 도움이 돼.
highlight_sentences.foreign_text: then it helps to identify where your money is going.
highlight_sentences.reason: 이 문장은 예산 관리의 핵심 이점인 '돈의 흐름 파악'을 명확히 설명하여 초급 학습자가 중요성을 쉽게 인지하도록 돕습니다.
